plot: In a fairytale kingdom, the king and queen always have a son named Peter, who grows up and ventures forth to rescue a princess from the forces of evil, making her the new queen, etc. ...
title: Petronella
plot_es: In a fairytale kingdom, the king and queen always have a son named Peter, who grows up and ventures forth to rescue a princess from the forces of evil, making her the new queen, etc. ...
plot_en: In a fairytale kingdom, the king and queen always have a son named Peter, who grows up and ventures forth to rescue a princess from the forces of evil, making her the new queen, etc. ...
